channel.title: Attractiveness on Brian James Advisory
channel.description: Recent content in Attractiveness on Brian James Advisory

item.title: Men: Don't Make These Mistakes
item.description: My brothers, Last month I had a day trip with my friends and need the mountain bike. But then I realised there was a small problem with the gear of my mountain bike, so I took my tools and tried to fix it (my first attempt ever). Well, I didn’t know why but after a while of trying hard, my bike was totally spoilt. Sign. Quite disappointing there. After all I had to rush to the bike shop to get another total new one.
